projects.name: Arcade Live
projects.description: Arcade Live is a game mobile and web application(IOS/Android/WebApp) played online on real Arcade Game machines controlled remotely through video streaming via mobile and web apps. Users can buy credits, and choose an Arcade Game machine to start playing. Each machine required different amount of credits to play the game. User can choose from between two option to play games for as a reward: Play for Tickets & Play for Games.

projects.name: Passio Nutrition-AI
projects.description: Passio Nutrition-AI is an industry leading food recognition and nutrition tracking SDK designed to enable app developers to effortlessly add real-time on-device food recognition and typing-free food tracking functionality into their mobile applications.

projects.name: Become a Saver
projects.description: Become a Saver is a simplified budgeting app that connects to your existing checking account. Use Saver's complete money management system to beat debt and build savings.Saver is not just another budgeting app; it's a complete money management system designed to empower you to make the most of your hard-earned money.

projects.name: Biped
projects.description: Biped is a smart and discrete harness, worn on the shoulders, with wide-angle cameras working like an autonomous driving car, for pedestrians. It transforms visual information into sounds.

projects.name: iLocalBox Admin Portal
projects.description: iLocal Box's smart inventory control kiosks put your products within reach of the customer. Applications such as retail pharmacy, local Rx pick-up, and hospital out-patient are now made Local.
